title: Passing Clouds
description: This is the true story of a British boy, born in the West Midlands in the year of 1937. It gives an account of his growing up in an ordinary family during the years of World War Two and up to the completion of his first decade in his home town of Burton–upon–Trent, Staffs. The author explores the feelings and emotions of people as seen and picked up by young eyes and minds in those days.But, at the end of the day, it is just his story.
author: G.A.A. Kent
